caption: Peripheral Activity
description: Peripheral Activity events report when a system interacts with a peripheral device.
name: peripheral_activity

1.caption: Connect
1.description: A peripheral device was connected to the system.

2.caption: Disconnect
2.description: A peripheral device was disconnected from the system.

5.caption: Eject
5.description: A peripheral device was ejected from the system. This is typically used for removable media devices. Note: For Mount/Unmount events, see the File System Activity event class.

peripheral_device.description: The peripheral device that is the subject of the activity.
